Pshhh... Shkohhh...<hex:02100103>Lightkix watchguards entrance to giant of whirlycog. But if uplander wants Lightkix to help fight, it will cost heaps of jinglyshine!
What would you like to do?
Ask about Midas (Savage).

What would you like to ask about?
Entry requirements for Midas (Savage).
Nothing.
Pshhh... Shkohhh...<hex:02100103>Uplander wishes to enter metal giant again? Lightkix thinks idea is addlebrained, but he will not stop uplander.
Midas (Savage) is comprised of multiple dungeons. Please be warned that the spell Return cannot be used in certain dungeons.
Progress within Midas (Savage) is saved at specific locations for each player, and you may resume your foray where you left off.

Progress is reset every <hex:020603120303><hex:020942DDFF07>Sunday<hex:FF07>Monday<hex:FF08>Tuesday<hex:FF0A>Wednesday<hex:FF09>Thursday<hex:FF07>Friday<hex:FF09>Saturday<hex:03> at <hex:020821DBFF1D><hex:020919DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C03><hex:0D03> <hex:020810E0DB0DFF05>p.m.<hex:FF05>a.m.<hex:03> (Earth time).
To enter Midas (Savage), you must be in a party of eight Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 60 or higher.
All members must also have completed the quest “A Refrain for the Undaunted.”
The starting point is determined by the party leader's progress.
Even party members whose progress is different may participate, provided they meet the entry requirements.
Those who have not advanced as far as the party leader will have their progress updated to be the same as that of the leader.
Those who have advanced further than the party leader, on the other hand, will retain their progress.
In this latter case, you will not receive rewards from dungeons that you have already completed, and the number of coffers that pop will be adjusted accordingly.
All forays into Midas (Savage) are limited to 90 minutes (Earth time).
All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area.
Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
Enter <hex:022815FF10>InstanceContent<hex:E8020403> (Loot Rule: Normal)?
Enter <hex:022815FF10>InstanceContent<hex:E8020403> (Loot Rule: Greed Only)?
Enter <hex:022815FF10>InstanceContent<hex:E8020403> (Loot Rule: Lootmaster)?
Yes
No
You were unable to enter <hex:022815FF10>InstanceContent<hex:E8030403>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.

Pshhh... Shkohhh...<hex:02100103>Lightkix is skilled watchguard, and will let uplander know if Illuminati move one ilm out of colossus. But unfortunately, Lightkix is not so skilled with fightytools...
You have recently completed Midas (Savage), and cannot enter again until progress is reset.
